about_the_game:
After the 1918 revolution, Skoropadskyi’s Hetmanate was established in Ukraine, and Germany won the Great War. This victory was enabled due to the Serdiuk Division; and you will play as a Characternyk, a combatant of that division. The Serdiuk Division was charged with investigating the incomprehensible events of 1978 in the State’s major cities, Orbita and Vitov. Your assignment is to unveil the mysterious events that happened there.
The Molfar: Call of Heart features:
- Complete Ukrainian and English localization;
- Full Ukrainian voiceover;
- 6 diverse locations that require different approaches;
- Story based on alternate history and mysticism of Ukraine;
- Eerie atmosphere;
- Pleasant colorful visuals.
You will play as a battle mage of the Serdiuk Division, Characternyk. He has keen eyes and he knows where to find hidden things. You will have to destroy evil fiends, find solutions to problems, interact with other characters, all in order to figure out what happened in Vitov and Orbita, and bring the end to the causes and consequences of the affliction.
